typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as string,
		IsDeleted as boolean,
		RowVersion as binary,
		AreaId as string,
		CompanyId as string,
		BuyerId as string,
		BankId as string,
		MovementType as integer,
		ValueDate as timestamp,
		MovementDate as timestamp,
		CurrencyId as string,
		TotalAmount as decimal(19,4),
		ResidualAmount as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
Parse1 derive({Low Amount} = toInteger(TotalAmount) <= 1000,
		{Medium Amount} = toInteger(TotalAmount) > 1000 && toInteger(TotalAmount) <=10000,
		{High Amount} = toInteger(TotalAmount) > 10000,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 split({Low Amount}==true(),
	{Medium Amount}==true(),
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(LowValues, MediumValues, HighValues)
ConditionalSplit1@LowValues select(mapColumn(
		Id,
		IsDeleted,
		RowVersion,
		AreaId,
		CompanyId,
		BuyerId,
		BankId,
		MovementType,
		ValueDate,
		MovementDate,
		CurrencyId,
		TotalAmount,
		ResidualAmount
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
ConditionalSplit1@MediumValues select(mapColumn(
		Id,
		IsDeleted,
		RowVersion,
		AreaId,
		CompanyId,
		BuyerId,
		BankId,
		MovementType,
		ValueDate,
		MovementDate,
		CurrencyId,
		TotalAmount,
		ResidualAmount
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
ConditionalSplit1@HighValues select(mapColumn(
		Id,
		IsDeleted,
		RowVersion,
		AreaId,
		CompanyId,
		BuyerId,
		BankId,
		MovementType,
		ValueDate,
		MovementDate,
		CurrencyId,
		TotalAmount,
		ResidualAmount
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
source1 parse(RowVersion = RowVersion ? string,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	format: 'delimited',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	nullValue: '') ~> Parse1
Select1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['3FSCashDB-low.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Select2 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['3FSCashDB-medium.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
Select3 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['3FSCashDB-high.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
